timeline.bodyText:
can be replaced with method reference:
.map(Response::getValue);
timeline.author: abhipsaMisra
abhipsaMisra

timeline.bodyText: Return type here should be the keyword void, not the Void class type.
timeline.author: abhipsaMisra
bikamani

replies.bodyText: Yeah, javadocs only have the @ return if it returns something other than void. We'll still need them for cases like Mono, but here you can remove it
replies.author: timtay-microsoft

timeline.bodyText: why we need to write this return?
timeline.author: bikamani

replies.bodyText: java doc analyzer will complain if there is no return section in the comments for publicly facing APIs
replies.author: azabbasi
